subject: Simsonn Order #SSN4783 Address Confirmed
description_text: Hello, we apologise for any inconvenience caused. We are unable to deliver to military addresses. May we send the item to your billing address instead?  2498 Chestnut Dr Bismarck AR 71929

conversations.body_text: Ok, do you deliver to South Korea?
Hi Scott. garrett11311,    Of course, you may provide a Korean address.
Hi Scott,    Please provide us with your address as soon as possible, and we will arrange for shipment promptly.
204-307 Dream Castle Apartments, 626-11 Sinjang-dong, Pyeongtaek, Gyeonggi-do

Hi Scott. garrett11311,    Please confirm the postal code and phone number:  Garrett Scott  204-307 Dream Castle Apartments  626-11 Sinjang-dong  17758 Pyeongtaek  Gyeonggi -do   Korea  +1 501-802-1096
Phone number is correct. Postal code is 17750.
Thank you for your prompt reply. We will ship your order as soon as possible.

Hi Scott. garrett11311,    We apologize for the inconvenience, but we are currently processing your shipment. The logistics provider requires your Korean personal customs code. Please provide it as soon as possible. Thank you.

I don’t think I will be able to get that in time. I’m sorry for the inconvenience but you can just cancel my order.


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone
Hi Scott. garrett11311,    Don't worry, we'll ship it to you via express delivery. It only takes 2-3 days to reach South Korea. Please provide the information as soon as possible.

Hello,
Can you please cancel my order and refund me. Thanks.
Hi Scott. garrett,    Alright, we'll cancel your order for you.  Merry Christmas!

Good morning,
I noticed that my purchase still hasn’t been refunded to my card. I would appreciate it if you could take care of that please. Thanks


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone
